name:
I've decided to stop syndicating certain types of content to Micro.blog, including Checkins, Replies, and Likes, in favor of keeping those exclusively on my website.

I think it'll make for a more pleasant experience for my followers 👍🏻

content.html:
I've decided to stop syndicating certain types of content to Micro.blog, including Checkins, Replies, and Likes, in favor of keeping those exclusively on my website.

I think it'll make for a more pleasant experience for my followers 👍🏻
content.value:
I've decided to stop syndicating certain types of content to Micro.blog, including Checkins, Replies, and Likes, in favor of keeping those exclusively on my website.

I think it'll make for a more pleasant experience for my followers 👍🏻

summary: @cleverdevil My default is notes only but I added micro.blog as a syndication target. So I can technically syndicate any content to micro.blog but only if I think it adds value.

content.html: @cleverdevil My default is notes only but I added micro.blog as a syndication target. So I can technically syndicate any content to micro.blog but only if I think it adds value.
